definitions.text: an indigenous person who was born in a particular place
examples: the art of the natives of the northwest coast
the Canadian government scrapped plans to tax the grants to aboriginal college students

definitions.text: a person born in a particular place or country
examples: he is a native of Brazil

definitions.text: characteristic of or existing by virtue of geographic origin
examples: the native North American sugar maple

definitions.text: characteristic of or relating to people inhabiting a region from the beginning
as found in nature in the elemental form
